description.title: The description Schema
examples: Discover your Most Fashionable Collocation with Newchic. Shop The Latest Trends. Our range of products include Clothing & Shoes & Home Garden & Accessories and so on.

description.title: The description Schema
examples:
Get exclusive offers on Newchic
1. The offer is valid upto 2022-02-28
2. The offer is valid for Accessories & Bags, , Shoes, Marketplaces including Chinese Stores, Clothing only
3. The offer is applicable for Desktop / Web
4. The offer is valid on all users only
5. The offer is applicable for crayon card users only
6. The offer is applicable at online
7. Accidental Loss of coupon shall not be covered 
8. Coupons are not transferable 
9. Coupons cannot be replaced if emails are deleted by the claimant
10.Customer is redirected to third party website – Terms of third party website will be applicable on the shopping experience
11.The offer is applicable on select categories/products ONLY
12.The coupon will be auto applied on the merchant website and only using the offer link the discount will be applied.

Get exclusive offers on Newchic
1. The offer is valid upto 2022-04-30
2. The offer is valid for Accessories & Bags, , Shoes, Clothing only

6. The offer is applicable at online

8. Coupons are not transferable 
9. Coupons cannot be replaced if emails are deleted by the claimant
10.Customer is redirected to third party website – Terms of third party website will be applicable on the shopping experience
11.The offer is applicable on select categories/products ONLY
12.The coupon will be auto applied on the merchant website and only using the offer link the discount will be applied.

howToRedeem.title: The howToRedeem Schema
examples:
1. Click on 'Claim' at the bottom of the Offer Page.
2. Click on 'Redeem Now' to get redirected to the merchant website.
3. Make sure the product you purchase is valid under offer T&C
4. The offer discount will be already applied at the merchant website
5. Make the payment using the valid bank card
